channel.title: Cheat Engine
channel.description:
So I have been looking around as fixed for Cheat Engine on PI because Cheat Engine worked on my source, and allowed you to change the item in a shop to anything and purchase it for the original items value. *change chisel to Armadyl Godsword and pay 1 gp for it*
Well I was only able to fix the value at which you purchase the item.
*when you change the chisel to Armadyl Godsword with Cheat Engine, it changes but now it costs what an Armadyl Godsword is supposed to cost.*
So now I need to find out how to stop Cheat Engine from allowing you to change the shop items variable.

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:400624”]If people are able to dupe items with Cheat Engine, then the servers today are even worse than I expected.

Has no one heard of input validation?[/quote]

I already stated above that I removed duping. They USED to be able to change the value of the item in the shop AS WELL as the item itself.

Now when they change the item in the shop, the value changes to the specified items value.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If people are able to dupe items with Cheat Engine, then the servers today are even worse than I expected.

Has no one heard of input validation?

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

Davidi2:

Actually nothing said so far has been correct. CheatEngine does not connect to your server. What it does is edit the value in the client, and then the client sends the ‘duped’ item id to the server. You’d need to change how your shops are handled. Can you post ShopAssistant so I can take a look?

Sure, here it is.

http://www.mediafire.com/?1jstjjaukeh8wkf

Btw, I recognize your name Davidi2, you’re pretty boss.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Actually nothing said so far has been correct. CheatEngine does not connect to your server. What it does is edit the value in the client, and then the client sends the ‘duped’ item id to the server. You’d need to change how your shops are handled. Can you post ShopAssistant so I can take a look?

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:400657”][quote author=emtrescue link=topic=497686.msg3639650#msg3639650 date=1308870334]
edit: have your client reject processes coming form cheat engine
[/quote]that would be java

@OP; I’ll tell you it’s handled in ShopAssistant.[/quote]

Thanks, so I need to reject processes coming from cheat engine in ShopAssistant?

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

make the item unsellable or make it so high they wouldnt purchase it

edit: have your client reject processes coming form cheat engine

open command prompt with your client and see what packets are being sent block all those packets
^ just a guess

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

I already did that. I’m well aware of cheat clients and that was one of the first things i did was change my client uid server and client side.

But you can still use Cheat Engine.

Basically I need to make it to where you cant change variables with cheat engine. I wouldn’t know where to begin, maybe declare the client to check if the item being purchased in the shop matches the item number in shops.cfg?

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

You need to change your client connections so only your client can connect to your server.

Read full topic

Well I was only able to fix the value at which you purchase the item.

when you change the chisel to Armadyl Godsword with Cheat Engine, it changes but now it costs what an Armadyl Godsword is supposed to cost.
